title: Claude@Stanford
description: Building and leading Anthropic's largest community of students building with Claude's suite of AI products.

title: Sunday High Table — SHiT
description: A weekly Sunday salon in Nairobi convening friends from diverse professions to discuss philosophy, culture, and the human experience.

title: Kenga Media
description: Built a digital and print publication covering stories on Africa's Gen Z culture and insights and crafting campaigns for youth-led startups.

title: EarlyAdmit
description: Co-founded a coaching platform helping students from underrepresented minority backgrounds get into top grad programs.

title: Designish
description: A learning community for Africans and diasporans looking to build careers in UX: product design, content design, and user research.

title: PRiDE+
description: The student-run society at the African Leadership University creating safe spaces for queer students and allies across the Rwanda and Mauritius campuses.
